remarks: Two ways expressing that ` x ` is effectively not free in ` ph ` . Simplified version of ~ sbnf2 .  Note:  This theorem shows that ~ sbnf2 has unnecessary distinct variable constraints.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 28-Jul-2019.)
statement: wl-sbnf1 $p |- ( A. x F/ y ph -> ( F/ x ph <-> A. x A. y ( ph -> [ y / x ] ph ) ) ) $.
